Title: ELSA-2025-7317:  python3.12-cryptography security update (MODERATE)
Description:
[41.0.7-2]
- Security fix for CVE-2025-24898 in the bundled openssl crate
Resolves: RHEL-77735

[41.0.7-1]
- Update to 41.0.7, fixes CVE-2023-49083

[41.0.5-2]
- Rebuilt for timestamp .pyc invalidation mode

[41.0.5-1]
- Initial package
